Author: 3cats_in_atrenchcoat
Text: I see my ed in the same light that I see my depression. Honestly some days I feel fine. I’m Motivated , outgoing, full of mirth, and not over thinking things. Of course till I’m over thinking things.   Mental Illness and toxic thought patterns can come and go. Doesn’t make your struggles any less valid. To me it just makes me have more perspective and in my darker points wonder if I’m just faking it/ that I could just feel “ better ^ tm tm tm “ all the time.

Author: no-property
Text: I feel you. Some days I can eat like a normal, not disordered person would and the other day I'm debating whether I should eat an apple and pushing that around.   It does get better in recovery, though, it's just very, very hard work with much fear factors to tackle.  Best of Luck.
